Needfinding

During an initial needfinding session, all stakeholders and both product owners described the workflow needs of potential users. At the end of the session we had identified 6 different audiences.

Prioritizing users without prioritizing a product owner

To drive a conversation about audience prioritization and reach consensus among stakeholders, I began by mapping all potential users' workflows across subject-level expertise and technical expertise.
